name: Dog tag
story: A dog tag dropped from a dying soldier, sacrifice himself for his brother-in-arm, it was someoneâ€™s keepsake, reminding of how their life was saved.
ending: Hoding a dog tag in your palm, you finally remembered that you're a survivor from a war. kneeling and crying, you remembered about your supposedly long lost friend. You keep the dog tag, treasured it with your life.
